get.description: Retrieve a list of source control sync jobs.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

parameters.name: automationAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the automation account.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

get.description: Retrieve the source control sync job identified by job id.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

parameters.name: automationAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the automation account.

parameters.name: sourceControlSyncJobId
parameters.description: The source control sync job id.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

put.description: Creates the sync job for a source control.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

parameters.name: automationAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the automation account.

parameters.name: sourceControlSyncJobId
parameters.description: The source control sync job id.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: The parameters supplied to the create source control sync job operation.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

SourceControlSyncJob.description: Definition of the source control sync job.

SourceControlSyncJobById.description: Definition of the source control sync job.

creationTime.description: The creation time of the job.

endTime.description: The end time of the job.

exception.description: The exceptions that occurred while running the sync job.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the job.

sourceControlSyncJobId.description: The source control sync job id.

startTime.description: The start time of the job.

SourceControlSyncJobByIdProperties.description: Definition of source control sync job properties.

SourceControlSyncJobCreateParameters.description: The parameters supplied to the create source control sync job operation.

commitId.description: The commit id of the source control sync job. If not syncing to a commitId, enter an empty string.

SourceControlSyncJobCreateProperties.description: Definition of create source control sync job properties.

value.description: The list of source control sync jobs.

SourceControlSyncJobListResult.description: The response model for the list source control sync jobs operation.

creationTime.description: The creation time of the job.

endTime.description: The end time of the job.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the job.

sourceControlSyncJobId.description: The source control sync job id.

startTime.description: The start time of the job.

SourceControlSyncJobProperties.description: Definition of source control sync job properties.
